statements: SELECT * FROM budget_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM budget_categories WHERE spending_limit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM budget_categories ORDER BY spending_limit ASC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories;
SELECT * FROM budget_categories WHERE category_name = 'Groceries';
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM budget_categories WHERE spending_limit > 1000 ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE spending_limit BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY spending_limit DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM budget_categories ORDER BY category_id ASC, category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY category_id DESC, category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM budget_categories;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE category_name = 'Groceries';
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories ORDER BY spending_limit DESC;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit, monthly_limit FROM budget_categories JOIN spending_limits ON budget_categories.category_id = spending_limits.category_id;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE spending_limit > 500;
SELECT * FROM budget_categories;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM budget_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE spending_limit > 1000;
SELECT budget_categories.category_name, spending_limits.monthly_limit FROM budget_categories JOIN spending_limits ON budget_categories.category_id = spending_limits.category_id;

SELECT budget_categories.category_name, SUM(spending_limits.monthly_limit) AS total_monthly_limit FROM budget_categories JOIN spending_limits ON budget_categories.category_id = spending_limits.category_id GROUP BY budget_categories.category_name ORDER BY total_monthly_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM BudgetCategories ORDER BY category_name ASC
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM BudgetCategories WHERE spending_limit > 1000
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_id = '1a2b3c'
SELECT * FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Food%'
SELECT category_name, SUM(spending_limit) AS total_spending FROM BudgetCategories GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_spending > 5000
SELECT category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE spending_limit > 1000 ORDER BY category_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_name LIKE 'T%'
SELECT * FROM BudgetCategories WHERE spending_limit BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY spending_limit DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT category_id, category_name, spending_limit FROM BudgetCategories WHERE category_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT category_name FROM BudgetCategories WHERE spending_limit < 500 ORDER BY spending_limit ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories WHERE spending_limit > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, category_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username, budget_amount FROM users JOIN user_budgets ON users.user_id = user_budgets.user_id;
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT u.username, b.budget_amount, c.category_name FROM users u JOIN user_budgets b ON u.user_id = b.user_id JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = b.category_id;
SELECT category_name, SUM(spending_limit) AS total_spending_limit FROM categories GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT u.username, c.category_name, b.budget_amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_budgets b ON u.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN categories c ON c.category_id = b.category_id WHERE b.budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY u.username ASC, c.category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM budget_categories;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM entertainment_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 100;
SELECT expense_id, expense_date FROM grocery_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT category_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM shopping_expenses JOIN budget_categories ON shopping_expenses.category_id = budget_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM grocery_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 50 ORDER BY expense_date DESC, expense_id ASC;
SELECT category_name, spending_limit FROM budget_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT expense_id, expense_amount, expense_date FROM entertainment_expenses WHERE category_id = 2 AND expense_amount BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT category_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM budget_categories JOIN shopping_expenses ON budget_categories.category_id = shopping_expenses.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM travel_expenses WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
